Property.Name: PBT Index
Property.Description: Persistent, Bioaccumulative and Toxic (PBT). Values of the Global Half-Life Index â€” GHLI were used as a quantitative measure of a compound's persistence (P) in different environmental media. Bioconcentration (B) - log BCF. Toxicity (T) - experimental 96 h LC50 data (Duluth fathead minnow database).
